roleset.name: to gather into a mass
roleset.note: MASS-V NOTES: Frames file for 'mass' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from mass.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: intransitive
example.text: As the country 's new leader , Egon Krenz , prepared [*-1] to travel to Moscow today for talks with Soviet leader Gorbachev , hundreds of thousands of East Germans massed in the streets of Leipzig , Halle and Schwerin [*-2]to call for internal freedoms and the legalization of the New Forum opposition group .
example.arg: As the country 's new leader , Egon Krenz , prepared [*-1] to travel to Moscow today for talks with Soviet leader Gorbachev
hundreds of thousands of East Germans
in the streets of Leipzig , Halle and Schwerin
[*-2] to call for internal freedoms and the legalization of the New Forum opposition group
